title: Plan weekend hiking trip
description: Research trails, check weather, and pack gear for Saturday adventure
notes:
### Trail Options
1. **Blue Ridge Trail** - 5 miles, moderate difficulty
2. **Mountain View Loop** - 3 miles, easy
3. **Summit Peak** - 8 miles, challenging

### Packing List
- [ ] Water bottles (2L)
- [ ] Trail snacks
- [ ] First aid kit
- [ ] Map and compass
- [ ] Weather-appropriate clothing

**Weather Check**: Friday evening for Saturday conditions

title: Update project documentation
description: Revise API docs and add new endpoint specifications
notes:
## Documentation Updates

### New Endpoints
- `POST /api/users` - Create user
- `PUT /api/users/:id` - Update user
- `DELETE /api/users/:id` - Delete user

### Existing Updates
- Update authentication section
- Add rate limiting information
- Include new error codes

```javascript
// Example request
fetch('/api/users', {
  method: 'POST',
  body: JSON.stringify(userData)
});
```

**Review with**: Technical team before publishing
